docs.lead_paragraph: BUFFALO, N.Y., March 23 (AP) The State Public Health Council passed today strict new controls over hospital nursery kitchen supplies in an effort to prevent mix-ups such as the one that caused the salt-poison death of six babies in Binghamton two weeks ago.

headline.main: NEW RULES CONTROL HOSPITAL BABY FOOD
